entry.title: Herman's Simply Clean
entry.summary:
Vendor: Herman's
Type: Liquid Jewelry Cleaner
Price: 13.95

  • Developed by an internationally respected silver conservator who has researched polishes for 30+ years.
  • Mild enough for museum objects and your finest sterling and silver-plated flatware, holloware, and jewelry
  • Contains no harsh abrasives
  • No ammonia
  • No acids
  • Non-toxic
  • Earth-friendly
  • pH: 7.5
  • Fragrance-free
  • Creamy consistency
  • Leaves no residue
  • Removes fingerprints from stainless steel
  • Complimentary silver cleaning assistance
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Jewelry Wipes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Jewelry Care Products
Price: 6.95

Blitz® Jewelry Wipes is perfect for quick and easy cleaning at home, work, or travel. Clean and restore the original brilliance to platinum, gold and silver jewelry. - 30 Disposable dry wipes (2.75 IN x 4 IN) - Contains no harsh chemicals - Non-Toxic and Environmentally Friendly - Made in the USA Blitz Stock # 2017 Note: Do not use this product on pearls, opals, coral, lapis lazuli, malachite, ivory, 24 karat gold or lacquered surfaces.

entry.title: Ring Snuggies®
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Jewelry Care Products
Price: 6.95

Blitz Ring Snuggies® may be applied AFTER the ring is on the finger, making them ideal for persons with enlarged knuckles or for ring sizing on the go.
Blitz Stock # 20938

Optical and Lens Cloth Finally, someone made an optical and lens cloth that actually works! Use this cloth for cleaning sunglasses, eyeglasses, binoculars, telescopes, CD's, DVD's, TV's, and etc. Since this lens cleaner is made from microfiber, it won't ever streak or leave dust and lint behind.

entry.title: Watch Care Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Jewelry Care Kits
Price: 12.95

The Blitz® Watch Care Kit is specially formulated for the care of gold, silver, platinum and leather watches. Not for use on porous gems and pearls.
  • Do not wash, will remove special cleaning agents.
  • Cloths contains no harsh chemicals or abrasives.
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
PACKAGE CONTENTS:
  • 4" x 6" Polishing Cloth: Cleans and restores the original brilliance to your watch face.
  • 4" x 6" Silicone Leather Treatment Cloth: Clean and Protect your leather watch bands.
  • Blitz Foamz: Deep cleans your metal, diamond and gem stone jewelry without the mess.
  • 8" x 8" Microfiber Cloth: Cleans and takes special care of crystal faces. These cloths are designed to be lint free and are designed to not scratch or damage your watch face in any way.
Blitz Stock # 20680 NOTE: ALL CLOTHS MEASURED OPEN AND FLAT

entry.title: Ultrasonic Silver Cleaning Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Jewelry Cleaning Machines
Price: 10.95

The Ultrasonic Silver Cleaning Kit easily removes tarnish from silver and consists of the special re-usable Silver Cleaning Plate and 4 Activator Packets. For use with an Ultrasonic jewelry cleaning machine. Mix 10:1 ratio with HOT tap or distilled water.
  • Non-Toxic and Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock #20762 NOTE: The silver cleaning plate is suitable to be used more than once. You simply will need more of the packets, which can be purchased at any time. WARNING: Soft and porous stones, or any other gems may not be suitable for an ultrasonic cleaner. Do not store the silver cleaning plate in the solution between uses.

entry.title: Silver Shine Instant Jewelry Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Jewelry Care Kits
Price: 8.95

Easily and instantly remove tarnish from silver without the use of harsh or toxic chemicals. Using nothing but tap water and our Activator Solution, watch as tarnish is immediately lifted from the surface of your silver. Each box of this silver jewelry cleaner contains a 4" x 6" two-ply treated silver buffing and polishing cloth, three of the special trays, basket, and a ready to mix silver cleaning solution. It all comes packaged in a wide mouth jar to easily clean larger pieces of silver jewelry. Refills of the Activator Solution can be purchased right here at Blitzinc.com!
  • Do not wash, will remove special cleaning agents.
  • Cloth contains no harsh chemicals or abrasives.
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 681 Need instructions for use? Watch the Silver Shine Instant Jewelry Cleaner Tutorial Video! NOTE: ALL CLOTHS MEASURED FLAT AND OPEN

For use on gold, silver, platinum, diamond, ruby, sapphire, topaz, amethyst, aquamarine, garnet, peridot, and other non-porous precious and semi-precious gems & jewelry.

entry.title: Gem & Jewelry Cleaner Concentrate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Liquid Jewelry Cleaner
Price: 7.95 - 29.95 (2 variants)

Gem and Jewelry Cleaner Concentrate is a non-toxic concentrated liquid that mixes with water to clean jewelry in all types of jewelry cleaning machines and ultrasonic jewelry cleaning machines. This non-toxic formula is for use in all types of jewelry cleaning machines and is specially formulated for the cleaning & care of gold, silver, platinum, diamonds, ruby, sapphire, topaz, amethyst, garnet, peridot and other non-porous precious and semi-precious gem jewelry.
  • Scent Free
  • 5:1 ratio
  • Non-Toxic and Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Ultra Silver Polishing Cloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Jewelry Polishing Cloths
Price: 6.95

This cloth restores your silver jewelry, silver-plate and hollowware to its original brilliance. This cloth will remove tarnish from the surface of silver while also applying a tarnish inhibiting layer to the surface allowing for longer protection. This single-ply silver polishing cloth can be used again and again, even after the cloth begins to darken.
  • Do not wash, will remove special cleaning agents.
  • Cloth contains no harsh chemicals or abrasives.
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 93118 The Ultra Silver Polishing Cloth is not meant for use on lacquered surfaces. NOTE: ALL POLISHING CLOTHS MEASURED OPEN AND FLAT

entry.title: MoonGlow Cloth for Rhodium
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Jewelry Polishing Cloths
Price: 6.95

This cloth is soft and simple to use. Buff lightly to remove moisture, streaks, or dirt** and your dull metal will shine again. If you need a soft cloth to wipe, buff, or just clean after steaming, or other rinsing and cleaning, this is perfect and it cleans white gold too!
  • Treatment-Free Microfiber Cloth
  • For rhodium-plated silver or white gold
  • Washable
  • Approximately 8" x 8"
  • Soft white color only
  • Private Label available Visit our Wholesale Site for more info!
  • Cloth contains no harsh chemicals or abrasives.
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 20880 **Dirt particles like sand, can severely scratch glass, plastic, or metal. Makes sure to loosen gently, or (if possible) rinse item first to remove gritty particles. NOTE: ALL CLOTHS MEASURED OPEN AND FLAT

entry.title: MoonGlow Cloth for Pearl Care
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Jewelry Polishing Cloths
Price: 6.95

Made of the finest suede-like microfiber cloth and treated with unique ingredients specially chosen to enhance and preserve your valuable jewelry investment. This cloth has a special all-vegetable derived oil. The cloth will quickly clean any pearl and yet not remove the essential oils and substances of your soft stone. Easy to use. Just lightly rub your cloth on pearl or pearlescent jewel and it will come clean.
  • Do not wash, will remove special cleaning agents.
  • Cloth contains no harsh chemicals or abrasives.
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 20466 For more intense cleaning, use our Blitz Gem and Pearl Cleaner, or Blitz recommends Blitz MoonGlow Cloth for Soft Gems. NOTE: ALL CLOTHS MEASURED OPEN AND FLAT
